name: #Heavy PD Drone Forge
desc: Installs a compact nanoforge to create a pair of Attack Funnel drones to defend the parent vessel. Incompatible with PD Drone Forge.

name: #PD Drone Forge
desc: Installs a compact nanoforge to create a Attack Funnel PD drone to defend the parent vessel. Incompatible with Heavy PD Drone Forge.

name: #MK88 Forge
desc: Installs a compact nanoforge to create four MK88 drones to defend the parent vessel. Incompatible with PD Drone Forge hullmods.

name: MVS Siege Retrofit Package
desc: A comprehensive retrofit package designed to specialize MVS vessels for siege warfare. Extends the range of ballistic and energy weapons by a flat %s/%s/%s/%s SU, depending on hull size. Futhermore, enhanced ammo loaders improve ammunition regeneration by %s for ballistic and enegy weapons. Projectile velocity is improved by %s. Extra plating is added to the vessel, improving armor by a flat %s units. However, these upgrades cause undue stress on the engines, causing engines to take %s more damage and decreases speed by %s.
short: Increases Ballistic/Energy weapon range, ammo regeneration, armor, and range, but decreases speed and engine health.

name: Blast Hardening
desc: Specialied armor components are installed in the Korsettes-class's hull, reducing damage from ship explosions by %s percent.

name: Interceptor Focus
desc: A combination of specialized nanoforge components and cramped forgevats means larger LPCs are harder to mount, increasing bomber OP costs by %s percent, and non-interceptor fighter OP costs by %s percent. However, interceptor LPCs cost %s less OP to mount

name: Machina Targeting Systems
desc: Enhanced weapon FCS and target tracking systems allow projectile weapons to fire at an extended range of%s, but reduce their ROF by%s.

name: Regenerative Materials
desc: Unknown forces at work on this ship allow engines and weapons to be repaired nearly instantly when disabled.

name: Hardened Engines
desc: Unknown forces at work on this ship allow engines to be nigh invulnerable to damage.

name: Machina Extended Engagement Protocols
desc: Machina Void Shipyards operatives are expected to hold their ground even directly after a previous engagement, decreasing deployment CR loss  by %s/%s/%s/%s percent, depending on hull size. Furthermore, Combat Readiness degredation per second is decreased by %s percent.
short: Decreases CR loss on deployment and increases dissipation.

name: Simplified Maintenance Protocols
desc: Reduces the monthly maintenance supply cost by %s.

name: Passive Chronoboost
desc: Increases local timeflow by %s. Disabled when system is active or ship is overloaded/venting.

name: Absolution Array
desc: An array of advanced anti-ground artillery weapons allow the Dominion to both bombard surface targets and provide support to friendly ground forces from orbit.  Increases the effective strength of planetary raids and orbital bombardments by %s.
short: Improves effectiveness of raids and bombardments.

name: Guided Fuel Canisters
desc: The St. Florian's fuel canisters are fitted with guidance packages, allowing them to hit targets with greater precision when used in orbital bombardments. This reduces fuel costs for bombardments by %s due to fewer wasted canisters from misses. Furthermore, these makeshift guided bombs can be used in close support, increasing the effective strength of raids by %s.
short: Improves effectiveness of raids and bombardments.

name: Overclocked Autoforge
desc: The Stiletto's integrated autoforge increases the production rate for missiles with integral auto-fabrication systems, albeit at the cost of payload strength. Increases missile regeneration by %s, but decreases damage per missile by %s.
short: Improves missile regeneration rate, but decreases damage.

name: Justitia Weapon Selector (Primary)
desc: The Justitia's frame allows core weapons to be swapped out for various types of engagement.

name: Justitia Particle Accelerator Rifle (Primary)
desc: Remove to cycle weapons.

name: Electro-Flechette Launcher (Primary)
desc: Remove to cycle weapons.

name: Barrage Autocannon (Primary)
desc: Remove to cycle weapons.

name: Variable Focus Core
desc: The Hybrid Cruiser's core structure can be readily modified for two different roles. Availabe for installation are the Enhanced Ordnance Core, improving missile weapon performance and travel speed, or the Siege Core, which improves ballistic weapon performance and range. However, these traits make it impossible to install %s.

name: Enhanced Ordnance Core
desc: Improved missile systems increase missile weapon ROF by %s and reloading missile weapon ammo regeneration by %s. Engine upgrades improve top speed by %s.

name: Siege Core
desc: Enhanced targeting systems improve ballistic and energy weapon range by %s and improved autoloaders increase ballistic ammunition regeneration by %s. Enhanced flux core increases dissipation by %s.
